Question: Historians disagree on whether Vietnam would have escalated had this person survived and been re-elected in 1964.
Hints: Caroline Bouvier **** was born in 1957 and is the only surviving member of JFK's immediate family.
A week earlier, this person had proposed that Congress tighten the conflict of interest laws.
This person gave a speech at Saint Anselm College on May 5, 1960, regarding America's conduct in the emerging Cold War.
